headline: Seagate Technology (STX) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of data storage manufacturer Seagate (NASDAQ:STX) jumped 3.8% in the afternoon session after it received multiple price target upgrades from Wall Street analysts who anticipate a surge in demand driven by artificial intelligence (AI).

raw.headline: Seagate Technology (STX) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
raw.summary: Shares of data storage manufacturer Seagate (NASDAQ:STX) jumped 3.8% in the afternoon session after it received multiple price target upgrades from Wall Street analysts who anticipate a surge in demand driven by artificial intelligence (AI).

headline: Western Digital stock surges: A closer look at the record climb
summary: Western Digital (WDC) stock has more than doubled since the start of 2025, hitting record highs as Wall Street analysts raise their price targets for the stock. Rosenblatt Securities managing director and senior research analyst Kevin Cassidy explains why he made a bullish call for the company and shares his outlook for the stock and other names in the space, like Seagate (STX). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Cannabis Stocks Rally After Trump's Post On Health Benefits. But There's This Risk.
summary: IBD's specialty consumer products industry group, which is predominantly made up of cannabis stocks, rose 3% midday Monday.

headline: Morgan Stanley materially lifts HDD price targets and forecasts
summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley sharply raised its price targets and earnings forecasts for Western Digital and Seagate Technology, arguing that the hard disk drive (HDD) market has entered a “Stronger for Longer” cycle supported by AI-driven demand and cloud investment.

raw.headline: Morgan Stanley materially lifts HDD price targets and forecasts
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley sharply raised its price targets and earnings forecasts for Western Digital and Seagate Technology, arguing that the hard disk drive (HDD) market has entered a “Stronger for Longer” cycle supported by AI-driven demand and cloud investment.
